channel.title: Allow everyone to have a profile picture
channel.description: I think you should allow everyone to have a profile picture. It adds some fun to the community and so... It lights up it rather than having empty names and mods having it.

item.title: Allow everyone to have a profile picture
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

This is an age-old discussion. We’re against allowing everyone to have avatars because it makes the board look tacky and causes longer load times. Besides that, it would be a tremendous amount of moderation to make sure people to use inappropriate images.

Read full topic
item.source: Allow everyone to have a profile picture

item.title: Allow everyone to have a profile picture
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Taharok:

By profile picture do you mean avatar?

yes

Read full topic
